Code.Name: European agreement on the international carriage of dangerous goods on road (ADR)
Code.Description: European agreement on the international carriage of dangerous goods on road. ADR is the abbreviation of "Accord europeen relatif au transport international des marchandises dangereuses par route".

Code.Name: NDR European agreement for the transport of dangerous goods on the river Rhine
Code.Description: European agreement giving regulations for the transport of dangerous goods on the river Rhine, officially known as: "Accord europeen relatif au transport international des marchandises dangereuses par navigation sur le Rhin.".

Code.Name: CA, Transport Canada's dangerous goods requirements
Code.Description: Canadian transport of dangerous goods requirements as published by Transport Canada in the Canadian Gazette, Part II.

Code.Name: JP, Japanese maritime safety agency dangerous goods regulation code
Code.Description: Regulation regarding the handling of dangerous goods on vessels issued by Japanese maritime safety agency.

Code.Name: MARPOL 73/78
Code.Description: International Convention for the Prevention of Pollution from Ships, 1973, as modified by the Protocol of 1978 relating.

Code.Name: GHS regulation
Code.Description: The United Nations Globally Harmonized System of Classification and Labelling of Chemicals.

Code.Name: Transport emergency (TREM) card
Code.Description: A card providing details on procedures for emergencies during transportation according to ADR.

Code.Name: DE, ADR and GGVS combined regulations for combined transport
Code.Description: Combined German and European regulations for the transportation of dangerous goods on German and other European roads. ADR means: Accord Europeen relatif au Transport international des marchandises Dangereuses par Route. GGVS means: Gefahrgutverordnung Strasse.

Code.Name: ADNR, Autorisation de transport de matieres Dangereuses pour la Navigation sur le Rhin
Code.Description: Regulations for dangerous goods transportation on the Rhine.

Code.Name: DE, ARD and RID - Combined regulations for combined transport
Code.Description: Combined European regulations for the combined transportation of dangerous goods on roads and rails. ARD means: Autorisation de transport par Route de matieres dangereuses. RID means: Reglement International concernant le transport des marchandises Dangereuses par chemin de fer.

Code.Name: US, 49 Code of federal regulations
Code.Description: United States federal regulations issued by the US Department of transportation covering the domestic transportation of dangerous goods by truck, rail, water and air.

Code.Name: DE, ADR, RID, GGVS and GGVE - Combined regulations for combined transport
Code.Description: Combined German and European regulations for the combined transportation of dangerous goods on German and other European roads and rails. ADR means: Accord Europeen relatif au transport international des marchandises Dangereuse par Route. RID means: Reglement International concernant le transport des marchandises Dangereuses par chemin de fer. GGVS means: Gefahrgutverordnung Strasse. GGVE means: Gefahrgutverordnung Eisenbahn.

Code.Name: DE, GGVE (Gefahrgutverordnung Eisenbahn)
Code.Description: German regulation for the transportation of dangerous goods on rail.

Code.Name: DE, GGVS (Gefahrgutverordnung Strasse)
Code.Description: German regulation for the transportation of dangerous goods on road.

Code.Name: IATA ICAO
Code.Description: Regulations covering the international transportation of dangerous goods issued by the International Air Transport Association and the International Civil Aviation Organization.

Code.Name: IMO IMDG code
Code.Description: Regulations regarding the transportation of dangerous goods on ocean-going vessels issued by the International Maritime Organization.

Code.Name: DE, RID and GGVE, Combined regulations for combined transport on rails
Code.Description: Combined German and European regulations for the transportation of dangerous goods on German and other European rails. RID means: Reglement International concernant le transport des marchandises Dangereuses par chemin de fer. GGVE means: Gefahrgutverordnung Eisenbahn.

Code.Name: Railroad dangerous goods book (RID)
Code.Description: International regulations concerning the international carriage of dangerous goods by rail. RID is the abbreviation of "Reglement International concernant le transport des marchandises Dangereuses par chemin de fer".

Code.Name: UK IMO book
Code.Description: The United Kingdom (UK) version of the International Maritime Organisation (IMO) book on dangerous goods.

Code.Name: Mutually defined
Code.Description: Additional and/or other information for the transportation of dangerous goods which are mutually defined.
